title: Alexander and the car with a missing headlight
creator_credit: Cynthia Freitag, Peter Fleischmann, Weston Woods Studios and Institut für Film und Bild
brief_description: Released by the Weston Woods Studios in 1966 and English language version directed by Cynthia Freitag. A fantasy about a small boy’s adventures as he drives around the world in an old car. Pictures, sound effects and narrative comments are by children of different nations. From the book by Peter Fleischmann and Morton Schindel. Suitable for lower primary level.
